Subject: Re: DrillBit

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 138
From: Rudra656@...

::Cygnar::
    "I see you brought a friend.  No matter.  Apocalypse decided to leave 
without picking you up.  I don't know why.  And since your message was to him 
no one else answered it.  Here's the plan.  You tunnel under the shields of 
the Trainer base.  Most of us go inside and blow the living hell out of them. 
 A few will stay outside to bombard the shields while we attack from behind.  
Simple plan really.  Now come along. We're regrouping at the Syria base."  He 
opens a com to Ramjet.  "Ramjet.  We're staging at the Syria base.  Report 
there ASAP.  Cygnar out."  He takes off for Syria.
